returns.errorsByType: Array of error counts by type

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CONGESTION_THRESHOLD().notice: Network congestion threshold (gas price in gwei)

MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS().notice: Maximum retry attempts for failed transactions

attemptRecovery(bytes32,(uint256,uint256.notice: Attempt to recover from a failed transaction

checkOperationAllowed(address,uint256,ui.notice: Check if operation should proceed based on current conditions

errorTypeCounts(uint8).notice: Mapping of error types to their occurrence counts

transactionErrors(bytes32).notice: Mapping of transaction hashes to error data

userFailureCounts(address).notice: Mapping of addresses to their failure counts
